name: Magetastic
description:
Welcome to the land of magic, and we hope your stay will be Magetastic!

Magetastic is currently a free VR game demo that we at Mohavi made in a month to try working with VR. We ended up loving VR, and would like to keep working on it. We would love to publish VR-games in the future, one possibly sharing the same name as this one if we are able to get funding.

Since Magetastic is a demo, the  gameplay is limited but still very fun and shows the potential. We have a GDD (Game Design Document) that you can find here, if you would like to read more about our initial vision of the final product.

To find out more information about Mohavi and our projects, check out our website and social medias @mohavicreative

Controls: 
Instructions and more can be found in the character's spellbook. The spellbook can be grabbed from your left hip area.

Switch to grab: 
Oculus controller - click the joystick for grab
Vive controller - click center of track pad for grab

There are 4 types of magic to choose from and each type of magic has 3 spells to cast.

Switch magic type: 
Grip button + gesture.
Each magic has a simple gesture that can be found in the spellbook

Select a spell:
Oculus controller - Move joystick to select a spell
Vive controller - use track pad area to select spell 

Cast a spell:
Use trigger to cast instant spells, eg: Ice lance shoot out like a gun
Hold trigger and then release to cast, eg: Fireballs can be thrown so hold the trigger and then make a throwing gesture and release the trigger at the desired time to throw the fireball

Requires VR headset to play. 
Requires that you have Steam and Steam VR installed
